text: If there are any additional reasons that are not listed for the previous question, please answer below.
How frequently do you have trouble reading captions when viewing content on Netflix?
Do you find that captions interfere with the media that you are viewing?
Do you prefer captions to be displayed differently for different types of content? (smaller, larger, different color, etc.)
How frequently do you edit the visual appearance of captions on Netflix?
Were you aware that you could edit the appearance of captions on Netflix?
How frequently do you view media that has dialogue in a language other than your native language?
How frequently do you view media on Netflix for the purpose of learning/practicing a language?
Would you be interested in having captions displayed in more than one language?
